name: Dinoferoce
description:
Dinoferoce is a 2D Platformer Game where you race against other to finish first

Description:

You take place as a Dino in this 2D Platformer racing game !

You will have to compete against many other Dinos to end first.

Many differents traps will have to be dodged to win precious time.

A lot of differents paths exist and some are faster but might be harder to reach,

choose the right one to be the fastest Dino !

Some bonuses are available on the ground: catch them to get faster for a couple seconds.

Awesome and unique levels Features
  • Local up to 4 players
  • Multiplayer up to 10 players (not in alpha)
  • Timer for each levels
  • Leaderboard levels
  • 9 Levels available
  • Many different mechanics
Coming updates
  • Skins  and cosmetics
  • New maps and mechanics
  • Tournaments with rewards
  • Trailer and game footage
  • New musics
